taskGroups.title: Recorders
taskGroups.detail: This task group includes examples of active tasks that include spoken instructions and recorders that are currently included in the Research and ResearchUI frameworks.

tasks.title: Distance Recorder
tasks.subtitle: Activity for recording relative GPS location.
tasks.detail: This is an example task for recording GPS distance data using the RSDDistanceRecorder. This task also includes using the voice synthesizer to include spoken instructions.

tasks.title: Motion Recorder
tasks.subtitle: Activity for recording motion sensor data.
tasks.detail: This is an example task for recording motion sensor data using the RSDMotionRecorder. This task also includes using the voice synthesizer to include spoken instructions.

tasks.title: Image Picker
tasks.subtitle: Activity for selecting images.
tasks.detail: This is an example task for selecting images either from your photo library or using the camera.

tasks.title: Color Mapping
tasks.subtitle: This example shows the color rules uses by the Design System.
